title: How to get the last 10 years question paper of the CBSE class 10 - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: Oyeexams Available at Google Play Store can help you to make CBSE Board exam easy. They provide: For 10th, 12th (Science, Commerce and Humanities) 1. Previous 12 years solved papers with all paper sets for CBSE Delhi, Outside Delhi and Foreign Exams 3 SETS. 2. All papers in offline download. NO Internet required every time. 3. Graphical pattern analysis of each subject. 4. Trend analysis of each chapter. 5. All textbooks All these are for free. So it's time to study smart and stay ahead. here are some of their screenshots:     Shivansh Singh, all the best!

CBSE Last 10 Years (2007-2018) Question Papers Class 10 You might check any website on Google. Every website provides last 10 years question papers of class 10th and 12th along with solutions.  Also for your convenience you might buy any of the sample paper book available in the market. They will too provide you the required material for efficient practice. Hope this helps. Best wishes..

Just search cbse last 10 years paper class 10 on google. You ll get various websites.. Like aglasem etc. You can get it from there. Else in playstore, download mycbseguide. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=in.techchefs.MyCBSEGuide
not all the ten years question papers are here at http://cbsetody.com but they have some quality sample papers setup by the question paper setup and I am sure they will definitely help you a lot
